mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS facilityId, f.facility_name, f.facility_status, fd.id AS dataId, fd.facility_value, fd.create_date FROM m_facility f JOIN t_facility_data fd ON f.id = fd.facility_id WHERE fd.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND f.facility_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{facilityName}, '%')
